select car_id, car_name, img, manufacture_date, price, elec_mileage, battery_capacity from car where price between #{startPrice} and #{endPrice};

select car_id, car_name, img, manufacture_date, price, elec_mileage, battery_capacity from car where price between #{startPrice} and #{endPrice} and elec_mileage between #{startElecMileage} and #{endElecMileage};
